skills.title: Cloud of Lead
skills.description: Every Nth shot from you or Iron Bear won't consume ammo and adds Bonus Fire Damage to your Gun Damage.

skills.title: Dakka Bear
skills.description: Equips Iron Bear with a mannable Turret. While manned, Iron Bear and its rider deal increased Damage. Iron Cub always deals increased Damage instead. Bear Damage: +50% (twice). Turret Damage: +50%. Cub Damage: +20%.

skills.title: Matched Set
skills.description: Increases your Magazine Size for every equipped item that matches your held gun's Manufacturer.

skills.title: Stoke the Embers
skills.description: Increases your and Iron Bear's Fire Damage.

skills.title: Redistribution
skills.description: Scoring a Critical Hit, grants Health and Ammo Regeneration for a short time. Launcher Ammo regenerates slower. Duration: 3s.

skills.title: Scrappy
skills.description: Moving increases your Gun Damage, Handling, Weapon Swap Speed, and Mode Switch Speed.

skills.title: Rushin' Offensive
skills.description: You can now sprint and shoot at the same time. You also gain Lifesteal while sprinting. Sprinting Lifesteal: +8%.

skills.title: Scorching RPM's
skills.description: Increases your Fire Rate, Critical Damage, and Skill Damage. Iron Bear/Cub receive double these bonuses. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: The Iron Bank
skills.description: Increases your Magazine Size and Heat per Shot. *Bug: Should decrease Heat per Shot.

skills.title: Specialist Bear
skills.description: Equipping Iron Bear with duplicate Weapons increases their Damage. Bear/Cub Gun Damage: +60%.

skills.title: Some for the Road
skills.description: On Action Skill End you gain Infinite Ammo for a short time.

skills.title: Click, Click...
skills.description: Increases your Gun Damage. The emptier your Magazine or the hotter your COV the greater this Bonus. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Forge
skills.description: You gain passive Ammo Regeneration. Launcher Ammo regenerates slower. Ammo Regen/s: +5%. Launcher Ammo Regen/s: +0.5%.

skills.title: Fire in the Skag Den
skills.description: Your Area Damage deals extra Fire Skill Damage. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Deadlines
skills.description: Iron Bear's weapons drain less Fuel. Killing an enemy refuels Iron Bear. This has diminishing returns and Auto Bear is unaffected.

skills.title: Grizzled
skills.description: Killing an enemy reduces your Skill Cooldown. This effect has diminishing returns. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Means of Destruction
skills.description: Dealing Area Damage has a chance to return a Grenade or add Ammo to your magazine. This skill has a short cooldown. Cooldown: 0.3s

skills.title: Torgue Cross-Promotion
skills.description: Increases your and Iron Bear's Area Damage. Your and Iron Bear's Area Damage has a chance to double its size. Area Damage Radius: +100%

skills.title: Stainless Steel Bear
skills.description: Increases Skill Damage, Maximum Fuel and Iron Bear Health. Note: Iron Bear/Cub receive this Skill Damage twice.

skills.title: Pull the Holy Pin
skills.description: Your Grenades can now score Critical Hits, doubling their damage. Grenade Critical Hits are unaffected by Crit Damage Bonuses.

skills.title: Auto Bear
skills.description: After you exit Iron Bear he remains in place and attacks nearby enemies for a duration. When the duration ends Iron Bear charges at an enemy and self-destructs, dealing Physical Area Skill Damage. Duration: 15s Note: Exiting Iron Bear treats your Action Skill as ended.

skills.title: Vampyr
skills.description: Dealing Grenade Damage restores a portion of your Health. When Iron Bear/Cub deal Area Damage they restore Health.

skills.title: Why Can't I Carry All These Grenades?
skills.description: Increases your Grenade Carrying Capacity.

skills.title: To the Last
skills.description: You can now throw grenades while in Fight For Your Life. Gaining a Second Wind with a Grenade refunds the grenade.

skills.title: Explosive Punctuation
skills.description: Dealing Area Damage increases your Skill Cooldown Rate for a short time. Duration: 3s

skills.title: Short Fuse
skills.description: Dealing Gun Damage has a chance to trigger an Explosion, dealing Physical Area Damage. This has a short Cooldown. Chance: 20% per projectile Damage: 50% of damage dealt Cooldown: 0.1s *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Selfless Vengeance
skills.description: Reloading consumes a portion of your current Health and adds Bonus Fire Damage to the team's Gun Damage for a short time.

skills.title: Security Bear
skills.description: Iron Bear gets equipped with a Bubble Shield and increased Damage Reduction. The Bubble Shield is not weak to any Element. Iron Cub receives increased Damage Reduction. Bear Max-Shield: 50% of Max-Health. Bear Shield Recharge Delay: 5s. Bear Damage Reduction: +25%. Cub Damage Reduction: +50%.

skills.title: Armored Infantry
skills.description: While your Shield is active, you gain increased Gun Damage and Damage Resistance.

skills.title: Drowning in Brass
skills.description: Killing an enemy stacks Gun Damage for you, Iron Bear/Cub, and allies but reduces your Fire Rate for a short time. Max Stacks: 3. Stack Duration: 15s. Auto-Bear doesn't benefit.

skills.title: Thin Red Line
skills.description: A portion of your Health is transformed into Maximum Shield.

skills.title: Vladof Ingenuity
skills.description: Increases your Shield Recharge Rate, Maximum Shield, and Shock Resistance.

skills.title: Full Can of Whoop-Ass
skills.description: Activating your Action Skill increases the Team's Shield Recharge Rate and sets Recharge Delay to 0 for 2s. On Action Skill End you gain increased Damage Resistance and your Recharge Delay is set to 0 for 5s. Team: Recharge Rate: +25%. Damage Resistance: +50%.

skills.title: Experimental Munitions
skills.description: Your and Iron Bear/Cub's Critical Hits deal Bonus Fire Damage.

skills.title: Behind the Iron Curtain
skills.description: Improves your Shield Recharge Rate and Delay.

skills.title: Desperate Measures
skills.description: Increases your Gun Damage. The lower your Health the greater this bonus. Increases Iron Bear/Cub's Damage. The lower their Health the greater this bonus.

skills.title: Phalanx Doctrine
skills.description: Killing an enemy grants you stacking Gun Damage, Maximum Shield, and Iron Bear Left-Arm Damage for a long time. Max Stacks: 99. Stack Duration: 30s.

skills.title: Force Feedback
skills.description: Getting a Critical Kill restores a portion of your Shield and starts its Recharge. Max-Shield Restored: 10%.

skills.title: Tenacious Defense
skills.description: When your Shield breaks it instantly restores a portion and you gain increased Gun Damage for a long time. Your Shield needs to fully Recharge for this effect. If your shield breaks while Iron Bear/Cub is active their Left-Arm receives this bonus. Max-Shield Restored: 40%. Gun Damage: +30%. Duration: 30s.

skills.title: Biofuel
skills.description: When you or Iron Bear/Cub ignite an enemy, you two gain Health Regeneration for a short time. Duration: 8s.

skills.title: Big Surplus
skills.description: While your Action Skill is on Cooldown, all Damage you deal does extra Fire Skill Damage. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Really Big Guns
skills.description: Increases Iron Bear/Cub's Damage. Auto-Bear is not affected.

skills.title: Double Time
skills.description: While your Action Skill is active, you and Iron Bear/Cub gain increased Movement Speed.

skills.title: Harmonious Havoc
skills.description: Increases your Gun Damage with elemental guns. Each equipped item that matches your gun's primary element increases this bonus. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Explosive Fury
skills.description: Increases your and Iron Bear's Status Effect Damage and Chance. Bug: Bonuses are not working.

skills.title: Fired Up
skills.description: When you or Iron Bear apply a Status Effect to an enemy, you gain stacking Fire Rate and Burst-Fire Delay for a short time. Max Stacks: 5. Stack Duration: 12s. Fire Rate: +5% /stack. Burst-Fire Delay: +5% /stack.

skills.title: Nitrotrinadium Engines
skills.description: Increases your Skill Cooldown Rate and Maximum Fuel.

skills.title: Never Going to Give You Up
skills.description: When you or Iron Bear apply a Status Effect to an enemy, Iron Bear gains Fuel. This effect has diminishing returns.

skills.title: Feature Creep
skills.description: Increases Iron Bear/Cub's Damage and Damage Resistance. Auto-Bear is unaffected.

skills.title: Limit Break
skills.description: When you or Iron Bear apply a Status Effect on an enemy you gain stacking Skill Cooldown Rate for a short time. Max Stacks: 10. Stack Duration: 12s.

skills.title: Superior Firepower
skills.description: When you or Iron Bear apply a Status Effect to an enemy, only you gain increased Status Effect Damage and Cryo Damage for a short time. Max Stacks: 5. Stack Duration: 8s. Status Effect Damage: +20%. Cryo Damage: +20%.

skills.title: Running on Fumes
skills.description: When you or Iron Bear ignite an enemy, Iron Bear stops passively consuming Fuel for a short time. Duration: 6s.
